SummaryEnglish: The year is 2199. The human race has been crushed in their war with the Gamilos, driven into underground cities by the invader's assault. Scientists estimate they have only a year left. The young officers Susumu Kodai and Daisuke Shima receive a mysterious capsule from a ship that made an emergency landing on Mars and return with it to Earth. It contains humanity's last hope: the planet Iscandar on the other side of the Magellan Galaxy has the technology to defeat the Gamilos and restore the planet. The space battleship Yamato is entrusted with this task, but they have only one year before humanity ends.
Aliases: Space Battleship Yamato 2205: A New Voyage
宇宙戦艦ヤマト2199 追憶の航海
宇宙戦艦ヤマト2199 星巡る方舟
宇宙戦艦ヤマト2202愛の戦士たち
Uchuu Senkan Yamato 2202: Ai no Senshi-tachi

1.SummaryEnglish: This film is a compilation of the "Space Battleship Yamato 2199" series.

2.SummaryEnglish: After receiving the "Cosmo Reverse System" from Iscandar, the Yamato attempts to leave the Large Magellanic Cloud behind. With all Gamilan forces being ordered to disengage their attacks following Deslar's treachery, Captain Okita's crew imagine it will be a speedy trip back to Earth. Unfortunately, this illusion is shattered when a sinister new enemy emerges to exploit the power vacuum left in the Yamato's wake. Chosing to retreat rather than risk capture, the Yamato takes shelter on an enigmatic planet where nothing is what it seems. (NOTE: This movie takes place between Episodes #24 and #25 during the two-month break in time).

3.TitleEnglish: Space Battleship Yamato 2202: Warriors of Love
3.SummaryEnglish: Three years since the return of the legendary Space Battleship Yamato, Earth has begun rebuilding itself and has made peace with the Gamilans. However, this recovery comes at the cost of utilizing the forbidden Wave Motion technology. Meanwhile, the notorious former crew members of the Yamato, who have each gone their separate ways, receive a psychic message from the mysterious Goddess Teresa. She urges them to return to their beloved ship and travel to the distant planet Terezart. They are promised a revolutionary power to combat the unprecedented threat of the relentless Gatlantis Empire, who are approaching Earth with all but innocent intentions. Unable to resist her plea, the crew reassembles and sets sail on another perilous intergalactic voyage, one that will test their sheer courage and versatility in the face of an even greater foe.

4.TitleEnglish: The Era of Space Battleship Yamato: Choice of 2202
4.SummaryEnglish: The Era of Space Battleship Yamato: Choice of 2202 ("Uchū Senkan Yamato" to Iu Jidai Seireki 2202-nen no Sentaku), also known as Star Blazers Chronicle 2202 is a recap film that compiles Yamato 2199 and Yamato 2202 with new scenes The movie serves as a documentary-styled recap for Space Battleship Yamato 2199 and Space Battleship Yamato 2202, the fictional documentary is presented by a narrator and Shiro Sanada. The documentary mostly follows the event of the first two series and the movie Ark of the Stars, but its opening minutes focus on events preceding those shown in 2199 and 2202.

1.SummaryEnglish: The year is 2199. The human race was nearly destroyed in a war against the Gamilos and had to flee to underground cities. Researchers calculate they only have one year left. But then young officer Susumu Kodai and Daisuke Shima receive a mysterious message from a spaceship that has flown back to Earth from Mars. It contains the last hope of mankind! Across the galaxy, the planet Iscandar possesses technology that can defeat the Gamilos and restore the planet. The starship and battleship Yamato is tasked with the heroic task of attempting the maneuver, but they only have one year left...

In the year 2199, Earth is ravaged by attacks from alien beings of the the planet, Gamilus, which have devastated the surface of the Earth and forced what remains of mankind to take shelter underground. To save the Earth, the last of the Earth's space forces must distract the Gamilan forces while a non-Gamilan ship, the Amaterasu, lands on Mars to deliver the Wave Motion Activation Core to the Earthlings. While Captain Mamoru Kodai contains the enemy attack to allow fellow captain Juzo Okita to escape with his forces, Mamoru's brother Susumu and his friend Daisuke Shima investigate the Amaterasu that crashed on Mars. Inside the ship there is the corpse of an alien female, the messenger sent to Earth to make the important delivery to the Earthlings. Susumu and Daisuke return to Earth on the Kirishima, the only ship to return from the battle at Pluto. On the Kirishima, Susumu learns of his brother's death. When the Kirishima reaches Earth, Susumu Kodai looks for Captain Okita to know whether his brother was a decoy or not and meets Yuki Mori, who directs him to the hospital wing. Kodai confronts Okita, who says that it was he who led Mamoru to his death.

2.SummaryEnglish: Susumu brings the Wave Motion Activation Core to Earth which allows mankind to complete its first interstellar spaceship, the "BBY-01 Yamato". With Okita as the captain, Shima as the navigator, and Susumu as its battle chief, the Yamato is assigned to travel to planet Iscandar, in the Great Magellanic Cloud, with orders to retrieve a device able to restore Earth's environment. Before the Yamato can start its journey, it must counter a Gamilan interplanetary ballistic missle aimed at them.

3.SummaryEnglish: On Pluto, Gantz suggests sending out a fleet after the Yamato. Schultz turns down the suggestion, preferring to see what the Yamato does before attempting anything. After making a space warp, the Yamato 's main engine isn't transferring energy correctly, so Captain Okita orders the Yamato to land on a floating continent orbiting Jupiter, to make repairs to the engine. On the floating continent, Captain Okita orders the crew of the Yamato to go out and collect samples from the continent. After analyzing some of the plant samples from the continent, XO Shiro Sanada discovers that the floating continent is artificially made by the Gamilans. Meanwhile Raleta, commander of the Gamilas resupply base on the floating continent, gets a message from Gantz, ordering him to dispatch the combat fleet of four ships to attack the Yamato. The Yamato destroys three of the four ships sent after them, and then takes off from the continent. Okita orders Kodai to test fire the Wave Motion Cannon at the floating continent. Kodai fires the gun, destroying the entire continent. Nanbu is thrilled at the power of the weapon, but Okita says that the Yamato 's weaponry is for self-defense only, questioning whether they have done the right thing.

4.SummaryEnglish: When the Yamato lands on the Saturnian moon of Enceladus to collect some cosmonite and to answer a distress call, Susumu, accompanied by radar operator Yuki Mori and a medical team, investigates the remains of a crashed Earth ship, which he finds to be his brother's vessel, the Yukikaze. Unable to find any clue about Mamoru's whereabouts, they are ambushed by androids sent by the Gamilans and must fight them to escape.

5.SummaryEnglish: Before leaving the Solar System, the Yamato launches an attack to destroy the Gamilan facilities on Pluto to stop their bombardment of Earth with planet bombs. However, the ship ends up falling for a surprise attack from the enemy's secret weapon, and the crew of Yamato sends their pilot squadron to shut down the Gamilan base.

6.SummaryEnglish: Having deceived their enemies who believe that the Yamato was destroyed for good, the crew takes the opportunity to stage a counterattack after the Yamato pilots find the location of the main base.

7.SummaryEnglish: With the Gamilan attacks on Earth stopped, the Yamato prepares to leave the Solar System after giving to the crew members a last chance to contact their relatives that they left behind before resuming their journey to Iscandar.

8.SummaryEnglish: An operation staged by the Gamilan Leader, Abelt Dessler, forces the Yamato to navigate too close to a star in a desperate attempt to escape, maneuvering around solar flares that can instantly destroy the ship while being pursued by the enemy forces left from the Gamilan base on Pluto.

9.SummaryEnglish: One of the Gamilan androids retrieved by the Yamato on Enceladus is reassembled and activated in an attempt to learn more about their enemies. Analyzer, the Yamato's own robot, makes contact with the android and manages to befriend it. However, when the android escapes its confinement, the rest of the crew enters a state of alert and searches for it.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato falls into a dimensional rift and finds itself unable to escape. A Gamilan ship that is also trapped there approaches the Yamato and both crews come to a temporary ceasefire while they work together to escape. After the Yamato escapes the dimensional rift, General Goer meets it with a Gamilan fleet. Instead of fighting the fleet, the Yamato runs away, and the dimensional rift temporarily widens, swallowing the fleet.

11.SummaryEnglish: Melda Ditz, a Gamilan pilot under the custody of Yamato, claims that their attack on Earth was not unprovoked and that it was the Earthlings who first fired without warning during the first contact between both races years before. Daisuke, whose father was killed in the attack, does not believe her at all until Yamazaki, the sole survivor of his father's ship, reveals to him the truth about what really happened that day.

12.SummaryEnglish: General Domel of the Gamilans is called back from the front lines by Dessler and reassigned to the Milky Way with orders to stop the Yamato. As the Yamato approaches the edge of the galaxy, the crew becomes under attack by an extra-dimensional submarine.

13.SummaryEnglish: Taking shelter in an asteroid cluster, the crew of the Yamato discovers the enemy's ability to hide their vessel in sub-space and come up with countermeasures against them.

14.SummaryEnglish: Returning from a reconnaissance mission, Kodai and Yuki find a derelict Yamato with the rest of the crew missing. As the pair look for clues about what happened, they must face an enemy that can use their own memories against them, assisted by an unexpected ally.

15.SummaryEnglish: General Domel devises a scheme to trap the Yamato in the midst of a massive fleet of Gamilas warships, but he is unaware of what is taking place behind the scenes on his homeworld.

16.SummaryEnglish: Badly damaged and in need of provisions, the Yamato lands on a lush, fertile planet named Beemela. As a ground team makes a startling discovery, there are doubts if the ship still has a chance to complete its journey in time and the security force attempts a mutiny.

17.TitleEnglish: Out of the Forest of Memory
17.SummaryEnglish: With the aid of an alien device, Kodai, Yuki, and Sanada explore the control center of an abandoned warp gateway created by an ancient civilization and controlled by the Gamilas. In the midst of a deadly undertaking, Sanada unveils a surprise about the Yamato's navigational functions and his close friendship with Kodai's late brother, Mamoru.

18.SummaryEnglish: Using the newly reactivated warp gateway, fighter pilot Shinohara scouts the intended shortcut to the halfway point at planet Balun. Once there, however, he discovers a vast fleet of over 10,000 Gamilas ships. However, Okita declares that the Yamato must fight its way through the enemy's massive armada if they want to reach the Large Magellanic Cloud in time.

19.SummaryEnglish: As the Yamato penetrates the Large Magellanic Cloud, Domel, his name now cleared, engages in a battle of wits with Okita as he prepares a special attack force to stop the Earth vessel once and for all.

20.SummaryEnglish: Domel's task force engages the Yamato in a nebula dubbed the Rainbow Star Cluster. During a fierce battle in which the Yamato is heavily damaged and its Wave Motion Gun disabled, it is infiltrated by Gamilas operatives tasked to kidnap Yurisha of Iscandar.

21.SummaryEnglish: Yuki is taken to a Gamilas prison colony called Leptopoda. The Yamato is not far behind, its crew unknowingly seeking to resupply and repair. During a recon mission, Kodai and several others are also taken prisoner just before an old acquaintance foments a riot.

22.TitleEnglish: The Planet That We Head For
22.SummaryEnglish: Okita's condition takes a turn for the worse as the rest of the crew learns an unpleasant secret about their quest for Iscandar. Meanwhile, Dessler's grudge against the Yamato becomes more personal than ever, and he prepares to welcome the humans to the heart of Gamilas territory with a weapon of instant destruction.

23.SummaryEnglish: After being almost destroyed by Dessler's own Wave Motion Cannon, Okita orders the Yamato to launch an offensive at the Gamilas capital. However. Dessler escapes to his space fortress, the "Second Baleras" in a ship with Yuri on board. Dessler then drops a part of the fortress on the capital in an attempt to vanquish the Yamato while sacrificing his own people. While the rest of the crew engages it, Kodai departs to rescue Yuki by himself.

24.SummaryEnglish: With Dessler gone and the Gamilas ceasing their hostilities, the Yamato, at last, reaches Iscandar. However. Queen Starsha is in doubt about providing the assistance she promised upon seeing that the Earthlings used the technology that she entrusted to them as a weapon of mass destruction. After coming up with a decision, Starsha reveals to Kodai the ultimate fate of his brother as the crew of the Yamato prepares for the long journey back to Earth.

25.SummaryEnglish: Dessler, who is revealed to be still alive, ambushes the Yamato on its way back to Earth and the time comes for their final showdown.

26.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato is on the last leg of its journey back to Earth. However, Kodai has little to celebrate as Yuki did not survive the wounds she suffered in the last battle. However, witnessing the suffering of his brother, Mamoru's spirit appears next to him to create a miracle.

2.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato and her crew are on their way back to Earth from the planet Iskandar, and a lot has happened in the last three years. The inhabitants of the solar system are finally living in peace again and the earth has been restored and made habitable again with the help of the »Cosmo Reverse System«. The war with Garmillas is over and a peace treaty has been signed to strengthen military relations between the two powers and ensure long-term peace. In addition to rebuilding Earth, a new defense fleet was also built, with the state-of-the-art Andromeda as its flagship. Of course, such an expansion of one's defense fleet also brings with it the expansion of Earth's military might, despite Starsha Iskandar's explicit desire for peace...

1.SummaryEnglish: Three years have passed since the voyage to Iscandar. The Earth, revived with the use of the Cosmo Reverse System, is recovering rapidly. Meanwhile, an allied fleet of Gamillas and humanity is engaged in a battle against the mysterious Gatlantis. In the midst of the conflict, the Yamato stirs from its slumber...

2.TitleEnglish: Tension - Reach the Embassy on the Moon
2.SummaryEnglish: The newly established Earth Federal Government is enacting rapid military expansion plans culminating in the launch of four state-of-the-art Andromeda class starships equipped with Wave Motion weapons. Meanwhile, the former crew of the Yamato gathers at Captain Okita's memorial monument and try to make sense of the unease growing among them after they all received a strange vision compelling them to man the old ship.

3.TitleEnglish: Shock - Legacy of the Cosmo Reverse
3.SummaryEnglish: While Kodai has difficulty coming to terms with the knowledge of what truly happened to Earth after the restoration and the possible meaning of the vision he received, Mori struggles with her own identity, her relationship, and the fact that she wasn't called to the Yamato.

4.SummaryEnglish: With unease, Kodai takes the position of acting captain of the Yamato and its crew as they prepare to launch the ship, thus rebelling against the Earth Federal Government.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato reaches the asteroid belt beyond Mars but must soon face a powerful deterrent to their rebellion in the form of the Andromeda, one of the newly launched flagships of the Earth Federation Fleet.

6.TitleEnglish: Battle to the Death - The 11th Planet Rescue Operation
6.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato comes across a survivor from a Gatlantis attack on the eleventh planet, and the crew decides to go off course from their journey to Telezart to rescue any survivors.

7.TitleEnglish: The Beam of Light Flashes! Radiance of the Wave Motion Gun
7.SummaryEnglish: Trapped under rubble and deprived of sensors, the crew focuses on repairing the damage when an alarming report arrives from the outside. The Gatlantis are amassing thousands of ships in orbit around the artificial sun, and Analyzer's conclusion forces Kodai to contemplate a dramatic outcome.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato rendezvous with allied Gamillas ships on the volcanic planet Stravase in order to transfer the civilians rescued from the ruins of the eleventh planet.

9.SummaryEnglish: Zworder, Emperor of the Gatlantis, appears in front of Kodai and forces a dilemma.

10.TitleEnglish: Bewitching - The Space Fireflies Beckon a Crisis
10.SummaryEnglish: Yamato resumes its voyage to Terezart, but soon encounters a swarm of space-born organisms that threaten the stability of the crew and the ship. Teresa reaches out once more. Zworder dispatches a new ally of his own and an old adversary of Yamato to defeat the Earth vessel.

11.SummaryEnglish: The fallen leader of the Great Garmillas Empire, Abelt Dessler, is dispatched by Emperor Zworder to destroy a rogue Gatlantis fleet and hunt down the Yamato. As his old adversaries attempt to escape, Dessler takes advantage of a new opportunity.

12.TitleEnglish: The Shocking White Comet Empire - The Yamato Rams Through!
12.SummaryEnglish: Zworder brings the force of the White Comet directly to Yamato. Just as Katsuragi is revealed as an infiltrator and attempts to make her escape, she discovers a disturbing secret about her true nature.

13.TitleEnglish: The Terezart Landing Operation - Crush the Enemy Missile Fleet!
13.SummaryEnglish: The crew of Yamato plans and launches an assault on Gatlantis-occupied Terezart. At the head of the fleet defending the planet, a Gatlantean boy struggles to come of age.

14.SummaryEnglish: Yamato works under fire to break up the rocky crust imprisoning the planet Terezart, while Cosmo Marines and fighter pilots fight against Gatlantis' massively armed ground forces. Kodai, Sanada, and Saito venture under the surface of Terezart to meet the goddess Teresa.

15.SummaryEnglish: Klaus Kiiman and members of the Yamato crew face off against Abelt Dessler inside Teresa's underground sanctum, and learn secrets about the Garmillan people and Dessler's family. Above the planet's surface, the space battleship attempts to break through the blockade created by Dessler's fleet.

16.TitleEnglish: Farewell, Teresa! Flowers for Two Deslers
16.SummaryEnglish: Abelt Dessler and Klaus Kiiman join forces to control the power of Teresa and reclaim the Great Garmillas Empire. One of Dessler's most loyal followers emerges from hiding. Kodai, Sanada, Saito, and Nagakura attempt to escape from Dessler's flagship.

17.TitleEnglish: Battle off the Coast of Saturn - Gather the Wave Motion Gun Fleet!
17.SummaryEnglish: Earth assembles its new fleet of warships to stop the Gatlantis invasion, and Yamato makes its way home to join the battle. Kato's desperation over his son's illness pushes him to consider an unthinkable offer.

18.TitleEnglish: Yamato in Crisis - The Devil's Alternative Once More
18.SummaryEnglish: Zworder learns of the secret behind the Earth fleet that is defeating his own and moves to stop it. Yamato prepares to use a new weapon against the White Comet.

19.TitleEnglish: Heir to the Yamato, Her Name is Ginga
19.SummaryEnglish: With Yamato paralyzed by an act of sabotage, most of the crew evacuate as the ship plummets toward the White Comet, and comes to rest on a mysterious and deserted planet. Sanada and other officers are introduced to a new space battleship, and learn about Earth's increasingly drastic plans for victory. The Gatlantis share a cure for a tragic disease affecting Kato's son. Mori's memories return, but at a cost.

20.SummaryEnglish: An AI construct exposes Zordar’s past. His hatred of humanity and his mission to annihilate mankind finally surfaces.

21.SummaryEnglish: A device that could stop the Gatlanteans, once and for all, is uncovered, and prompts a counterattack from Zordar along with the mobilization of Earth’s new AI-controlled fleet.

22.SummaryEnglish: With Ginga’s assistance, Yamato is rebuilt. But can Yamato survive when one of their own is a potential spy?

23.SummaryEnglish: Miru has imposed a “devil’s choice”. But Kodai rejects those choices and instead offers a surrender. "No trigger need be pulled to the end the battle," he says. As Gatlantis does not understand the concept of surrender, Miru is further enraged and fires his gun again. Meanwhile, the White Comet has reached Earth.

24.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato, with support from the Garmillas fleet, infiltrates the White Comet in a bloody bid to reach the inner sanctum of Zordar: his throne room.

25.SummaryEnglish: By Zordar’s will, the Ark of Destruction awakens, revealing its true form, dwarfing Earth. The crippled Yamato can no longer fight. As captain, Kodai issues the final command.

26.SummaryEnglish: It is the year 2203, six months later. Hero's Hill is now lined with additional monuments. The true trial is about to begin.

3.SummaryEnglish: Three years have passed since the battle with the White Comet Empire. President Dessler, who has been searching for a new mother star to save the dying Gamirasu people, finds a star that meets the conditions in a section of the Milky Way galaxy. But it was within the territory of a mighty interstellar nation. The territorial dispute that broke out in the galaxy inevitably involves the Earth, which has a security treaty with Gamirasu. The magic of the time fault, which brought military and economic advantages to the earth, has disappeared in exchange for their own lives. Susumu Kodai sets out on a training voyage with the new crew in preparation for an upcoming emergency. Without knowing that someone who is aiming for himself is in the middle. Yamato is about to embark on a new journey in an era of unprecedented anxiety. On the way, an unimaginable new enemy awaits ...

1.TitleEnglish: A Galactic War is About to Break Out! Assemble the Yamato Fleet!!
1.SummaryEnglish: The year is 2205. Dessler, in search of a place for the Garmillas people to emigrate to, arrives at a planet named "Galman". Meanwhile, on Earth, the 65th Escort Squadron is born, with the Space Battleship Yamato as its flagship. Among the young crew members who spend their days training before departure, there is a young man, Domon Ryusuke, who turns a steely gaze toward the Yamato.

2.SummaryEnglish: Domon had obtained his assignment to Yamato through illegal means. The day of the 65th convoy's departure. The Yamato is set in motion by a new crew. In the engine room is Tokugawa Taisuke, the son of the chief engineer Tokugawa. And at the helm is Domon. Susumu Kodai, now Yamato's captain, questions his resolve by entrusting the ship to him.

3.SummaryEnglish: Countless black spears (Detherium Hammers) suddenly appear and stab into Garmillas, accelerating the melting of the planet's core. The planet begins to collapse, the earth is torn apart, and the remaining people are swallowed up by the magma. Dessler's determination to save as many people as possible is in vain, and now the final hour has come for Garmillas...?

4.TitleEnglish: Save Iscandar! Rebellion of the Young Heroes!
4.SummaryEnglish: The Dezarium Fleet Attacks! In order to save the refugees who had evacuated to the sea of Iscandar, the Dessler fleet continued to fight in isolation. However, the Earth government, fearing that the war might escalate, forbids Yamato to intervene and orders it to return home. Unsatisfied with the attitude of the adults, Domon and the other youths plot a rebellion.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato and two of its ships reach Iscandar, where they are joined by the Dessler fleet. Dezarium is targeting the planet Garmalio in the Bolzon solar system as an energy resource to further warp Iscandar. In order to frustrate this plan, Kodai decides to destroy Garmalio with a wave motion cannon.

6.TitleEnglish: Migrant Fleet Rescue Operation: Go Beyond the Dimensional Wall!
6.SummaryEnglish: The Earth-Garmillas fleet, helpless in the face of Dezarium's Autoplanet Gorba, decides to give priority to the rescue of everyone on Iscandar. However, Kodai, feeling guilty about the use of the wave motion cannon, is adamant about persuading Starsha. Dessler hurls words of contempt at her.

7.TitleEnglish: Iscandar, the Dying Planet of Sorrow
7.SummaryEnglish: Starsha invites Kodai and Dessler to Sanctel, a sanctuary which extends beneath Iscandar. In the great repository of star elements, Kodai is reunited with his late brother, Mamoru Kodai. What is the truth of Iscandar's "salvation" that brings peace to all intelligent life, and what is the truth of Garmillas?

8.SummaryEnglish: Out of love, Dessler cries out to Kodai to fire the wave motion cannon to avenge Golba's death. As he was about to accept this reality, Domon's youthful enthusiasm moved Kodai's heart. Save everyone. To carry out the plan that Domon had devised, Kodai and his team hurried to Starsha in the prototype dimensional submarine Cosmo Hound.

4.SummaryEnglish: In 2209, a mysterious "Grand Reverse" invades Earth's capital, defying defenses. The former Yamato crew reunites on a secret order, embarking on a perilous journey as an unknown invader threatens humanity's fate.

1.TitleEnglish: Begin the Secret Operation! Head for the New Yamato!
1.SummaryEnglish: As the crew of the Yamato settles into their new lives, a mysterious force heads towards Earth.

2.TitleEnglish: The Silent Invasion! Ginga, Take Up Your Arms!
2.SummaryEnglish: The invasion begins as the crew of the Yamato race towards a secret destination.

3.TitleEnglish: Shocking! The Dezarium's Dark Millennium of History
3.SummaryEnglish: The truth about the Dezarium and their secret past is revealed.

4.TitleEnglish: Fire the Starting Gun! The New Battleship Yamato Comes To Life
4.SummaryEnglish: The crew of the Yamato arrives at their destination, with a powerful Dezarium ship not far behind. Can the reborn Yamato stop this new alien threat?

5.TitleEnglish: Fierce Clash! Destroy the Invisible Battleship!
5.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato is confronted by a new type of peril: a Dezarium ship that can evade detection by turning itself invisible!

6.SummaryEnglish: A Dezarium officer makes a daring raid aboard the Yamato itself, and the crew must muster everything it can to stop him from taking Sasha.

7.TitleEnglish: The Terrible Orfevre Zone! Yamato, Bet It All on a Surprise Attack!
7.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato sets course for the Orfevre Zone, a dangerous area filled with collapsed gas giants.

8.TitleEnglish: Activate the Space Battleship Arizona! Reveal the true nature of the Dezarium!
8.SummaryEnglish: Back on Earth, the resistance engages in a daring plan to reveal the true nature of the Dezarium.

9.TitleEnglish: Friendship torn apart! Yamato, break through the subspace gate at all costs!
9.SummaryEnglish: The Dezarium set a clever trap for the Yamato as it enters the subspace gate.

10.TitleEnglish: The Fierce Attack of the Deusura-III! The Terrible Operation Asteroid!
10.SummaryEnglish: As the Yamato exits the subspace gate, it finds itself under attack by Garmilas.

11.SummaryEnglish: The crew is reunited with Sasha in an unexpected way.

12.SummaryEnglish: Frulul learns more about what it means to be human.

13.TitleEnglish: All Ships, Sortie! Eliminate the Planet Destroyer Missile!
13.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato attempts to intercept a deadly planet destroyer missile.

14.TitleEnglish: Enter the Dark Gas Clouds! Chase the Witch
14.SummaryEnglish: The Yamato dives into a dangerous gas cloud in search of the Witch of Uralia.
